data.lore: Powerful beyond reckoning, the Ascended being known as Xerath was once a mortal of flesh and blood. He is now something vastly different - a being of writhing arcane energy. Having emerged from millennia-spanning imprisonment, he is now ready to unleash his power upon Runeterra, and utterly destroy any who oppose him.
data.name: Xerath
data.title: the Magus Ascendant

spells.tooltip:
First cast: Xerath charges Arcanopulse, gradually decreasing his Movement Speed while increasing the spell's range.

Second cast: Xerath fires Arcanopulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line.

While charging Arcanopulse, Xerath cannot attack or cast other spells. If Xerath does not fire the spell, half the Mana cost is refunded.
spells.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: First cast: Xerath charges Arcanopulse, gradually decreasing his Movement Speed while increasing the spell's range. Second cast: Xerath fires Arcanopulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line. While charging Arcanopulse, Xerath cannot attack or cast other spells. If Xerath does not fire the spell, half the Mana cost is refunded.
spells.name: Arcanopulse
spells.sanitizedDescription: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.

spells.tooltip: Xerath calls down a blast of arcane energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies within the target area, slowing them by 10% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast take {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}%. This slow decays rapidly.
spells.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Xerath calls down a blast of arcane energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies within the target area, slowing them by 10% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast take {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}%. This slow decays rapidly.
spells.name: Eye of Destruction
spells.sanitizedDescription: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.

spells.tooltip: Xerath fires an orb of raw magic. The first enemy hit takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and is stunned for between 0.75 and 2.25 seconds. The stun duration lengthens based on how far the orb travels.
spells.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Xerath fires an orb of raw magic. The first enemy hit takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and is stunned for between 0.75 and 2.25 seconds. The stun duration lengthens based on how far the orb travels.
spells.name: Shocking Orb
spells.sanitizedDescription: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

spells.tooltip:
Xerath ascends to his true form, becoming rooted in place and gaining {{ e2 }} Arcane Barrages. This magic artillery deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit.

The root ends after {{ e1 }} seconds, when all shots have been fired or when manually deactivated by issuing a move command. If Xerath does not fire off a single Arcane Barrage, half of the cooldown of Rite of the Arcane is refunded.
spells.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains three shots of a long-range attack.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Xerath ascends to his true form, becoming rooted in place and gaining {{ e2 }} Arcane Barrages. This magic artillery deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit. The root ends after {{ e1 }} seconds, when all shots have been fired or when manually deactivated by issuing a move command. If Xerath does not fire off a single Arcane Barrage, half of the cooldown of Rite of the Arcane is refunded.
spells.name: Rite of the Arcane
spells.sanitizedDescription: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains three shots of a long-range attack.

passive.name: Mana Surge
passive.description: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.
